title: Dynamic and open
text: Pros Parlamind is an ambitious company with a great potential. The team is young and dynamic, with a relaxing and flexible atmosphere. We work as a team and everyone is open to help out when necessary. It's a place where communication is easy and flowing, and everyone's ideas are appreciated. There is not much hierarchy, everyone's role and work assignments are clear, but it's pretty informal. The team is rather international and both German and English are spoken. Cons Nothing in particular that I could identify as lacking or unsatisfactory, except the standard 25 vacation days (in some other companies this number can be up to 30).

title: Really nice working atmosphere and interesting challenges!
text: Pros What I like at parlamind is that everybody gets to work at challenging projects.
